Title: Human Resources Apprenticeship, September 2025 Start
Description: Please complete your application before 30th April 2025 for the September 2025 start.  This apprenticeship is intended for students who have work authorization in France. Individuals applying for this position will not be eligible for immigration sponsorship. How to apply  STEP 1: Combine the following documents in a single PDF file:  English CV  English cover letter explaining your interest in applying to be an apprentice, the degree you will start in September 2025, the curriculum you plan to follow and your rhythm of apprenticeship between school and enterprise.  STEP 2: Apply online: Click on the “Apply” button on this page to provide the above required materials in the appropriate sections: In the “Resume Section:” upload the PDF document created at step 1.
